Scene:
The Biwa Music
(Matsunami biwa / 松波琵琶)

Play: The Nunobiki Waterfall (源平布引滝)

Production: November 1970

– Click image to view.



Narrators (Tayu):

Takemoto Tsudayū IV (竹本津大夫 (四))



Shamisen Players:

Tsuruzawa Kanji VI (鶴澤寛治 (六))
